title: Where to Draft the Rookies in Your Fantasy Draft | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
Now that NFL teams are done with their draft, it’s time to prepare for yours. We run through the top rookie running backs and wide receivers like CeeDee Lamb, Henry Ruggs III, Jonathan Taylor, J.K. Dobbins, and more, and give you our predictions on how they will perform in their rookie season, where you should draft them, and how they will fit into their teams' offense.
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
